Interface Place

All Known Implementing Classes:
Bag, Cloud, DiningRoom, Entrance, Island, MovingCharacter
public interface Place

  • Method Details

    • giveStudent

      void giveStudent(Place destination, Student student) throws InvalidStudentException, InvalidActionException
      Transfers a student to the destination. The student will no longer be present in the object which this method is called on.
      Parameters:
      destination - Place which the method gives the student to
      student - The student given to the destination
      Throws:
      InvalidStudentException
      InvalidActionException

    • receiveStudent

      void receiveStudent(Student student) throws InvalidActionException
      Adds a student to the object which this method is called on.
      Parameters:
      student - The student to be received
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException

    • getStudents

      ArrayList<Student> getStudents()

    • setStudents

      void setStudents(ArrayList<Student> students)
